reviewText: It was okay, it did a good job outlining the philosophy and exposing some of the unfortunate things that have happened to some of the practioners.  However, I found it to be somewhat shallow and lacking in depth, especially the interviews.  They were too short and lacked substance.  In its infancy Scientology was a very good thing which was preverted.  There are some things that have merit, but were not considered.  I think it would of been better if it had been a little more objective.  Moreover, I don't think that anyone would disagree that what it has become is not acceptable.
